Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays near Illinois Medical District due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays near Illinois Medical District due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near Root/Princeton
ShortDescription: WB 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Wallace & Root, due to street blockage near Root/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Wallace and Root, due to street blockage near Root/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Western (Forest Park Branch) Station
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to a loss of power.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to a loss of power.

Shuttle buses are available between Illinois Medical District and Kedzie-Homan to provide connecting service.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
